description: Configuration for creating optimized activation display data with dual n-gram pattern classification

field_descriptions.pattern_type: Pattern classification: Semantic, Lexical, Both, or None (uses separate thresholds for semantic and lexical)
field_descriptions.char_ngram_max_jaccard: Jaccard similarity for the most frequent character n-gram
field_descriptions.word_ngram_max_jaccard: Jaccard similarity for the most frequent word n-gram
field_descriptions.quantile_examples: Pre-organized activation examples (8 total, 2 per quantile) with token positions for n-gram highlighting

quantile_example_fields.quantile_index: Quantile group (0-3) based on activation strength
quantile_example_fields.char_ngram_positions: List of {token_position, char_offset} where top char n-gram appears (enables precise character-level highlighting within token)
quantile_example_fields.word_ngram_positions: Token positions where top word n-gram starts (for word-level highlighting)

processing_notes.pattern_classification: Separate thresholds for semantic (avg_pairwise_semantic_similarity) and lexical ((char_jaccard OR word_jaccard))
processing_notes.lexical_threshold: Threshold for lexical pattern classification (char OR word Jaccard, default: 0.3)
processing_notes.optimization: Feature-level organization reduces load time from ~5s to ~20ms
processing_notes.frontend_usage: Positions enable visual highlighting of n-gram patterns in token display
